page.title: 01Alstonefield
page.content: (The spelling 'Alstonfield' is also used just as commonly.) The village lies to the west of the beautiful Dove Valley. It is the home of David Knox - M.P. for the North Staffordshire Constituency. Its population is diverse in its occupations and interests - farmers, civil engineers, a member of the Royal Observer Corps and quite a sizeable community of artisans and craftsmen and women. The 4kms of river which flow through the area contain some of the finest scenery - Shining Tor and Milldale. To the east of the river lies Derbyshire, the main Ashbourne-Buxton road, A515 and the edges of Alsop-en-le-Dale. The whole area is steeped in history - noticeable from its many tumuli and lows.
